title: All Screen Types Demo
desc: A single lesson that showcases every supported screen type.

data.title: Welcome to the Demo (theory)
data.text: This lesson is a guided tour of every screen type available in the app. We will touch each interaction once so you can see the full set.
data.footer: Let’s explore them in a simple, compact flow.

data.name: Ka (learn_char)
data.hook: Looks like a crab claw grabbing the air.

data.title: Find the Main Consonant (analysis)
data.text: Tap the main consonant in the word. This screen highlights the core letter in a Khmer block.

data.title: Select the Heroes (drill_choice)
data.subtitle: Choose only consonants.
data.prompt: Tap only the main consonant letters. Ignore the vowel marks.
data.success_text: ✅ Correct — the consonants are the heroes.
data.fail_text: ❌ Try again. Vowel marks are not heroes.

data.title: Meet the Team (meet-teams)
data.text: These are a few A-series consonants. Tap to hear them.
data.caption: A-series sample.

data.title: Listen and Compare (comparison_audio)

pairs.instruction: Tap both letters. Notice the sound difference.

data.note: They look similar, but the sounds are different.

data.question: Which item is a vowel mark (not a consonant)? (quiz)
data.explanation: The mark "ា" is a vowel sign.

data.title: Demo Complete (ready)
data.text: You have seen every screen type. This lesson is ready to use as a reference.
